thread.title: Former New York State Lawmakers Face Retrials on Corruption Charges

author: Corinne Ramey
title: Former New York State Lawmakers Face Retrials on Corruption Charges
text:
Two former New York state politicians will soon face accusations they abused government power for personal gain. Again.

The coming retrials of Sheldon Silver, former speaker of the New York state Assembly, and Dean Skelos, former majority leader of the state Senate, are being watched nationwide as test cases of federal prosecutors’ ability to win public-corruption convictions under a new legal standard. Last year, a federal appeals court overturned both lawmakers’ convictions, citing a U.S. Supreme Court decision that narrowed...
